name: Aces Up
description:
A solitaire game with the goal of removing all the cards except the four aces. Cards are dealt four at a time into columns. Touch the bottom card in a column to remove it if it's lower than another bottom card in the same suit.
Bonus abilities can be used to remove one card, swap positions of two cards or rearrange all the cards.
Earn extra points by making consecutive matches in the same suit.

Features:

* saved high scores, win/loss totals and options
* adjustable card and deck styles
* 3 different bonus abilities to help remove cards
* achievement system
